entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
